content.content: I would prefer less efficient but transparent DAO Governance than more efficient but dictatorship like DAO governance.
absolutely, would emergency cases be the exception?
Totally agree, dealing with a dictatorship is not easy, I say this from experience.

The problem with gurus is that they use their clairvoyance for their own ends. But (as a dictator would say), business is business.   en.wikipedia.org    Wild Wild Country Wild Wild Country is a Netflix documentary series about the controversial Indian guru Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh (Osho), his one-time personal assistant Ma Anand Sheela, and their community of followers in the Rajneeshpuram community located in Wasco County, Oregon, US. It was released on Netflix on March 16, 2018, after premiering at the Sundance Film Festival. The title of the series is drawn from the Bill Callahan song "Drover", which features prominently in the final episode, Review aggregator Ro...
